info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:57PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong and Erratic Winds... Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms were moving to the east across portions of Central and North Central Montana early this evening. Strong and erratic wind gusts of between 40 to 50 mph have been common with these showers and thunderstorms, with occasional cloud to ground lightning strikes where thunderstorms are present. Those working or recreating outdoors should be prepared to seek shelter should thunderstorms approach. Travelers should be prepared for strong cross winds, regardless of if a shower or thunderstorm is present as these showers and storms are producing outflow boundaries that are propagating to great distances away from the parent source.
